name: @randy.tarampi/job-applications
description: A utility to generate coherent job application (resume + cover letter) packages.

scripts.build: npm run build:gulp && npm run build:babel
scripts.prepare: if [ -z "$CI" ]; then npm run build; fi;
scripts.start:server: npm run kill:server; node ./server.js & echo $! > /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-applications.server.pid; echo "Started server (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-applications.server.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-applications.server.pid";
scripts.kill:server: if [ -f /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-applications.server.pid ]; then echo "Killing server (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-applications.server.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-applications.server.pid"; kill -9 `cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-applications.server.pid`; rm /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-applications.server.pid; fi;
scripts.cover: rm -rf coverage/ .nyc_output/; NODE_ENV=test nyc gulp -LLLL --color test
